dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare step into my domain, mortal?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I come in peace. I mean no harm.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Peace? Such a fragile concept. What do you seek here, then?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek knowledge about this realm. Can you help me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Knowledge? Mortals are always seeking what they cannot fully comprehend. I might share a tidbit... or not.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Please share your wisdom. I'm eager to learn.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Wisdom? Mortal, you have a lot to learn, and I have little to give. Begone!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I don't need your wisdom. I'll find my own path.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, mortal. Perhaps your path will lead you to destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I seek power to defeat my enemies. Can you aid me?
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Power? It corrupts and consumes; are you sure you want to walk that path?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Yes, power is all that matters. Help me achieve it.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Very well, seeker of power. I shall test your resolve.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: No, I seek a different way to overcome my foes.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A wiser choice, mortal. Strength comes in many forms.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am here to challenge you. Face me in combat!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Ah, a challenger approaches. Let us see if you are worthy of facing me.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I fear no ghost! Prepare to be vanquished!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Bold words, mortal. Let's see if your courage matches your bravado.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I... I think I made a mistake. I'll leave you be.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Pathetic. You are not even worth my time. Begone!
